page.title: 06A Family Day.
page.content: At 8'o clock I got up,washed and dressed while my mum made the breakfast.My brother and dad were already up.I gave my brother his birthday present and got packed for the trip to the Lake District.My mum left for work at 9'o clock while my dad loaded up the car.At 11'o clock we left for the Lakes and arrived there at 1.We had lunch and met our cousin Bonnie,auntie and uncle.After lunch William played in the lake while my dad and I went to Howtown Outdoor Activity Centre to ask permission to film there.When we came back we had tea and went to the pub.My mum came back from work at 10'o clock had tea and went to bed.At half past 10 we came back from the pub and went straight to bed.This was a half-term holiday and father was a teacher,that was why mother could not come with us.
